title: Christianity | Kierkegaard | Politics - Political Theologian and author Stephen Backhouse
description:
In this conversation, Julian and Stephen Backhouse talk about Kierkegaard, Christianity, and politics.
Stephen is a political theologian and Kierkegaard scholar. He runs an organization called Tent Theology that brings "real theology to every Christian." Tent Theology visits churches around the country to give seminars and talks on theology. Stephen runs a podcast called by the same name, which seeks to "renew the political imagination" of Christians. Stephen has also written a wonderful biography on Kierkegaard that everyone should go read. 

Stephen's podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/tent-theology/id1520369165
Stephen's biography of Kierkegaard: https://www.amazon.ca/Kierkegaard-Single-Life-Stephen-Backhouse-ebook/dp/B01863JMME
